text:
After download from http://apache.mirrored.ca the file
apache_1.3.29-win32-x86-no_src.exe fails to execute with an error "Program too
large to fit in memory".

This prevents installation from even starting.

This error was reported on the user list and confirmed by myself. I do not know
which mirror the other person downloaded from. And I have not yet confirmed the
MD5 - but I will.
creator: theantigod@sympatico.ca
theantigod@sympatico.ca
text: Error message is actually - Program too big to fit in memory
*** Bug 24534 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: slive@apache.org
slive@apache.org
text: This should be fixed now.  Thanks for the report.
